jokes: Rule 1: Programming is not only an art but also a science!

Example: My computer keeps crashing, so now it's time for the scientists at Google to figure out what's wrong! Surprising Twist/Punchline: The mysterious malfunction might have something to do with my poor coding practices. Number 1 - "I hate programming" -> "My computer keeps restarting itself, even when I don't touch it."

Rule #2: Writing code is hard work...and rewarding! Example : When you finally finish your first program, feel free to celebrate by taking up a new hobby like baking or rock climbing! Twist/ Punchline:- While writing a complex algorithm, you might accidentally find yourself in another room where the walls seem to stretch infinitely, leaving you feeling unsure if you made any progress

prompt_engineering.system_prompt: You are a world-class stand-up comedian known for razor-sharp one-liners. Write original, clever one-liner jokes that are concise (1-2 sentences max). Each joke must be self-contained, punchy, and end with a surprising twist or punchline. Never repeat the examples. Be creative and original.
